content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, y=23.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (-3.5, y=23.5)
- Boiler at Position (-7.0, y=23.5)
- Offshore Pump at Position (-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the offshore pump to the boiler

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (-14.0, y=-49.0)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (-13.5, y=-47.5), (-14.5, y=-45.5), (-13.5, y=-45.5), (-11.5, y=-45.5), (-9.5, y=-44.5), (-14.5, y=-43.5)
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-13.5, y=-46.5), (-13.5, y=-44.5)
- Iron Chest at Position (-11.5, y=-44.5)
- Belt Groups connecting various entities:
  - Belt Group from (x=-11.5, y=-46.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-46.5) and (x=-8.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-8.5, y=-43.5)
  - Belt Group from (x=-12.5, y=-44.5) to (x=-12.5, y=-46.5) and (x=-12.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-11.5, y=-46.5)

### Research Lab
- Lab with no research in progress

### Electricity Network
- Electricity Group with poles at various positions including (-9.5, y=-29.5), (-9.5, y=-25.5), and (-4.5, y=25.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities
- Verify that the entity you are trying to inspect has a valid inventory and is within operational status.

### Errors when placing entities into occupied tiles
- Check the target location for existing objects before placing a new entity to avoid conflicts.

### Errors when placing entities too far from the player
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity, as placement is limited by distance.
